cu.explanation_en: Changing the MCC from a number to a string will cause type validation errors during configuration parsing, leading to rejection of the CU configuration.

du.explanation_en: Setting SSB periodicity to an invalid enum value (99) will cause the DU to fail synchronization and reject the configuration due to unsupported periodicity.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 週期設定為無效的枚舉值 (99) 將導致 DU 同步失敗，並因不支援的週期而拒絕配置。
